r.s: Provides an implementation of the IMAP protocol
r.d: Provides an implementation of the IMAP4Rev1 protocol using PEAR's Net_Socket and the opnional Auth_SASL class.
r.n: - Fix in login() method (IMAP.php) now if the server don't have an auth method that I support the class uses the login command to authenticate - Make Auth_SASL packake optional - Minor fixes in protocol parser - new method getHierachyDelimiter() method to find the character used to separate subfolder parts (cyrus uses '.' , wu-imapd uses '/') - new method getACLRights() to list the Rights any user has over a mailbox without been administrator (this is relative to the user's INBOX) - added a 3rd parameter to getMailboxes() to return an array with mailboxnames and mailbox attributes instead of an array of names
